title: (4290) Brand New Luxury House for Sale, Thalawatugoda
details: Brand New Luxury House for Sale, 10.5 Perch Land in Thalawatugoda, 4 Bedrooms, 3 Bath rooms With Shower Cubicles, Vanity Basins and Jacuzzi Tub, Sitting, Dining, Pantry With Cupboards fitted With Cooker Hob & Hood, TV Room. Court Yard, Kitchen, Servant Room With Toilet, Balconies, Turfed Roof Garden, above Double Garage, Remote Door, Hot Water & Three Phase Electricity, Landscaped Garden. Rs : 310/= (Negotiable) 31 Million
